text: Anal Cunt is an American grindcore band from Newton, Massachusetts. They have been categorized as grindcore,Anal Cunt biography on RockdetectorRivadavia, Eduardo.Anal Cunt at Allmusic Guide noisecore, and hardcore. The band were famous for refusing to follow society's expected levels of behaviour. This non-conformity can be seen in the name of the band, and songs with titles such as "Recycling is Gay", "Kill Women" and "Eazy E got AIDS from Freddie Mercury". The lead singer, Seth Putnam, died on June 11, 2011, from a heart attack. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official MySpace page *Anal Cunt on Wicked Sick Records website Category:1988 establishments in the United States Category:Musical groups established in 1988 Category:1980s establishments in Massachusetts Category:2001 disestablishments in the United States Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2001 Category:2000s disestablishments in Massachusetts Category:Musical groups established in 2003 Category:2000s establishments in Massachusetts Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2011 Category:2011 disestablishments in the United States Category:1980s American music groups Category:1990s American music groups Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:American punk bands Category:Hardcore punk Category:Musical groups from Massachusetts
title: Anal Cunt
